name: HELMERICH DRIVE-IT-YOURSELF, INC., Appellant, v. ERIE MUNICIPAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Helmerich Drive-It-Yourself, Inc. v. Erie Municipal Airport Authority

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: HELMERICH DRIVE-IT-YOURSELF, INC., Appellant, v. ERIE MUNICIPAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order and Opinion of the Commonwealth Court are affirmed.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., notes his dissent.
FLAHERTY, J., notes his dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Wm. Patrick Delaney, James R. Fryling, Patricia K. Smith, Joanna K. Budde, Marsh, Spaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, Erie, for appellant.
Donald E. Wright, Jr., Erie, for appellee.

John L. Heaton, Chief Counsel, Gregory C. Santoro, Asst. Chief Counsel, Michael H. Kline, Asst. Counsel in Charge, Joanne Lichtenstein, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp., Harrisburg, for amicus curiae, Dept, of Transp.
William C. Cassebaum, Alan B. McFall, Cassebaum, McFall and Molnar, P.C., Bangor, for Lehigh-Northampton Airport Authority.
casebody.head_matter:
608 A.2d 495
HELMERICH DRIVE-IT-YOURSELF, INC., Appellant, v. ERIE MUNICIPAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1992.
Decided June 30, 1992.
Wm. Patrick Delaney, James R. Fryling, Patricia K. Smith, Joanna K. Budde, Marsh, Spaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, Erie, for appellant.
Donald E. Wright, Jr., Erie, for appellee.
John L. Heaton, Chief Counsel, Gregory C. Santoro, Asst. Chief Counsel, Michael H. Kline, Asst. Counsel in Charge, Joanne Lichtenstein, Asst. Counsel, Dept, of Transp., Harrisburg, for amicus curiae, Dept, of Transp.
William C. Cassebaum, Alan B. McFall, Cassebaum, McFall and Molnar, P.C., Bangor, for Lehigh-Northampton Airport Authority.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
This Order was voted upon prior to the death of Former Justice McDermott.
